release.action: Added signum to Fraction and BigFraction.
Prevent random failure of micro-sphere test case.

release.description: This is a maintenance release. It includes only bug fixes.
release.action: Prevent stack overflow error when attempting integration with too large number of points.
Show full precision in exception message when root bracketing fails.
When exception message formatting fails still show a helpful message and stack trace.

release.description: This is a maintenance release. The main changes since last version are the introduction of field versions of bilinear interpolation, univariate interpolators, polynomials and polynomial spline functions.
release.action: Added FieldBivariateFunction and make both BilinearInterpolatingFunction and PiecewiseBicubicSplineInterpolatingFunction implement it. Github: fixes #55.
Added FieldUnivariateInterpolator and make both LinearInterpolator, AkimaSplineInterpolator and SplineInterpolator implement it.
Added FieldPolynomialFunction and FieldPolynomialSplineFunction.
Fixed documentation for interpolation algorithms. Github: fixes #53.

release.description: This is a maintenance release. The main changes since last version are the introduction of bilinear interpolation for 2D grids, field versions of sinCos and a way to build three-dimensional field arrays.
release.action: Added bilinear interpolation for 2D grids. Github: fixes #48.
Added field version of sinCos. Github: fixes #47.
Fixed wrong construction of an Illinois solver that really built a Pegasus solver. Github: fixes #44.
Renamed scale parameter to location parameter in the log-normal distribution, to avoid confusion. Github: fixes #4.
Bisection solvers failed to raise an exception when the search interval did not bracket a root. Github: fixes #40.
Added a way to build three-dimensional field arrays.

release.description: This is a maintenance release. The main changes since last version are the introduction of complex eigen decomposition, and introduction of a solver for continuous time algebraic Riccati equation.
release.action: Added in FastMath the methods Java 9 added in StrictMath. This ensures FastMath is always a drop-in replacement for Math/StrictMath. Github: fixes #36.
Added FieldUnivariateVectorFunction and FieldUnivariateMatrixFunction interfaces, as well as RealFieldUnivariateVectorFunction and RealFieldUnivariateMatrixFunction Github: fixes #35.
Added FieldUnivariateFunction interface and have polynomials implement it. Github: fixes #34.
Added new utility methods to create real and field vectors from dimension.
Allow FastMath to operate on RealFieldElements. This simplifies a lot "fieldification" of algorithms previously implemented with primitive double numbers.
Added a transposeMultiply method to compute A^T.B without creating the intermediate transposed matrix.
Added a multiplyTransposed method to compute A.B^T without creating the intermediate transposed matrix.
Added MatrixDecomposer interface that encapsulates algorithms tolerances.
Added a way to compute both sin and cos at once faster than performing two calls. This also speeds up DerivativeStructure.sin and DerivativeStructure.cos.
Fixed a problem with eigen decomposition of matrices with large coefficients. Github: fixes #30.
Added a solver for Continuous time Algebraic Riccati Equation.
Added complex eigen decomposition.
Added new RealFieldElement implementations computing a tuple. This allow to perform the same computation on several values at once. The getReal() value correspond to the first component of the tuple.
Added bracketing helper methods in UnivariateSolverUtils for RealFieldUnivariateFunction. Github: fixes #24.
Improved performance of getRow and setRow for Array2DRowRealMatrix and Array2DRowFieldMatrix. Github: fixes #22.
Added support for sampling from enumerated distributions in RandomDataGenerator. GitHub: fixes issue #19.
Added support for exact integration in PolynomialFunction. GitHub: fixes issue #18.
Added a factory to simplify building DerivativeStructure instances.
Added proper implementations of equals and hashCode to Fields so they can be used as keys in maps.
Added a derivatives method in Hermite interpolator, similar to the one from FieldHermiteInterpolator.
Added field-based derivative structures.
Added field-based QR decomposition. GitHub: fixes issue #17.
Performance improvement for Array2DRowRealMatrix.getSubMatrix() (and also Array2DRowFieldMatrix.getSubMatrix()). GitHub: fixes issue #12.
Improved parameter validation for probabilities provided to enumerated distribution constructors.
Added methods to expose the probability mass function to EnumeratedRealDistribution and EnumeratedIntegerDistribution.

release.description: This is the first release of the library
release.action: Renamed TestUtils in core stat.inference to InferenceTestUtils and TestUtils in the core unit test package to UnitTestUtils.
Moved EmpiricalDistribution and MultivariateNormalExpectationMaximization from the random package into stat.fitting and dropped ValueServer.
Moved sampling (random deviate generation) from distribution implementations to RandomDataGenerator in the random package.
Fixed "HypergeometricDistribution#logProbability(int)" which returned NaN in case the number of successes equals the population size.
Removed interface "DoubleArray".
Removed interface "NumberTransformer" and classes "TransformerMap" and "DefaultTransformer" related to transformation of arbitrary objects to double primitives.
Fix DerivativeStructure.pow for 0 argument and power less than 1.
Fix "FastMath#round(..)" to comply to changed contract of "Math#round()" in Java 8.
Fixed DerivativeStructure.pow(0.0) which was NaN when the DS was 0, despite it should always be 1.0 in this case, regardless of the base (even if the base is NaN, in fact).
Added Gauss-Laguerre quadrature for integration of improper integrals.
Added "AggregatableStatistic" interface for statistics that can aggregate results.
Added aggregation capabilities to "StreamingStatistics", replacing the removed class "AggregatingSummaryStatistics".

Removed "SynchronizedSummaryStatistics", "SynchronizedDescriptiveStatistics" and "SynchronizedMultivariateSummaryStatistics". All implementations are considered to be not threadsafe. Aggregation of results is preferred over synchronization.
Renamed "SummaryStatistics" to "StreamingStatistics". Additionally, removed support for setting custom statistics implementations.
Replaced "VectorialMean" with a more generic class "VectorialStorelessStatistic" which supports to apply any "StorelessUnivariateStatistic" on vector data.
Removed static "copy(A, B)" methods for storeless statistics.
"Median" does not extend from "Percentile" anymore, but uses composition instead.
Summary statistics based on external moments (e.g. Mean, Variance) are now immutable.
Simplified "BinomialConfidenceInterval" and its implementations into class "BinomialProportion".
Removed accuracy parameter in constructors of "RealDistribution" implementations that calculate the inverse cumulative probability analytically.
Refactored distribution implementations into separate sub-packages: "discrete", "continuous" and "multivariate".
Removed "copyOf" and "copyOfRange" methods in "MathArrays". "Object#clone()" and "Arrays#copyOfRange(...)" should be used instead.
Simplified "PivotingStrategyInterface" and implementations into single enum class "PivotingStrategy".
"RealVector#Entry" is now public.
"RealLinearOperator" is now an interface.

"Frequency" class now uses generics. For similar functionality as previous class wrt integer numbers, use "LongFrequency" which supports adding different integer number types (e.g. int, long, short) to the same "LongFrequency" instance.
Simplified exception hierarchy.
Modularized the library.
Forked from the Apache Commons Math library.
